post.summary: Retrieves VEP annotation for the provided list of variants

parameters.name: variants
parameters.description: List of variants. For example ["X:g.66937331T>A","17:g.41242962_41242963insGA"]

parameters.name: isoformOverrideSource
parameters.description: Isoform override source. For example uniprot

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated list of fields to include (case-sensitive!). For example: hotspots,mutation_assessor

post.summary: Retrieves VEP annotation for the provided list of dbSNP ids

parameters.name: variantIds
parameters.description: List of variant IDs. For example ["rs116035550"]

parameters.name: isoformOverrideSource
parameters.description: Isoform override source. For example uniprot

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated list of fields to include (case-sensitive!). For example: annotation_summary

get.summary: Retrieves VEP annotation for the give dbSNP id

parameters.name: variantId
parameters.description: dbSNP id. For example rs116035550.

parameters.name: isoformOverrideSource
parameters.description: Isoform override source. For example uniprot

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated list of fields to include (case-sensitive!). For example: annotation_summary

post.summary: Retrieves VEP annotation for the provided list of genomic locations

parameters.name: genomicLocations
parameters.description: List of Genomic Locations

parameters.name: isoformOverrideSource
parameters.description: Isoform override source. For example uniprot

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated list of fields to include (case-sensitive!). For example: hotspots,mutation_assessor

get.summary: Retrieves VEP annotation for the provided genomic location

parameters.name: genomicLocation
parameters.description: A genomic location. For example 7,140453136,140453136,A,T

parameters.name: isoformOverrideSource
parameters.description: Isoform override source. For example uniprot

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated list of fields to include (case-sensitive!). For example: hotspots,mutation_assessor

get.summary: Retrieves VEP annotation for the provided variant

parameters.name: variant
parameters.description: Variant. For example 17:g.41242962_41242963insGA

parameters.name: isoformOverrideSource
parameters.description: Isoform override source. For example uniprot

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: Comma separated list of fields to include (case-sensitive!). For example: hotspots,mutation_assessor

post.summary: Retrieves canonical Ensembl Gene ID by Entrez Gene Ids

parameters.name: entrezGeneIds
parameters.description: List of Entrez Gene Ids. For example ["23140","26009","100131879"]

get.summary: Retrieves Ensembl canonical gene id by Entrez Gene Id

parameters.name: entrezGeneId
parameters.description: An Entrez Gene Id. For example 23140

post.summary: Retrieves canonical Ensembl Gene ID by Hugo Symbols

parameters.name: hugoSymbols
parameters.description: List of Hugo Symbols. For example ["TP53","PIK3CA","BRCA1"]

get.summary: Retrieves Ensembl canonical gene id by Hugo Symbol

parameters.name: hugoSymbol
parameters.description: A Hugo Symbol. For example TP53

post.summary: Retrieves Ensembl canonical transcripts by Hugo Symbols

parameters.name: hugoSymbols
parameters.description: List of Hugo Symbols. For example ["TP53","PIK3CA","BRCA1"]

parameters.name: isoformOverrideSource
parameters.description: Isoform override source. For example uniprot

get.summary: Retrieves Ensembl canonical transcript by Hugo Symbol

parameters.name: hugoSymbol
parameters.description: A Hugo Symbol. For example TP53

parameters.name: isoformOverrideSource
parameters.description: Isoform override source. For example uniprot

get.summary: Retrieves Ensembl Transcripts by protein ID, and gene ID. Retrieves all transcripts in case no query parameter provided

parameters.name: geneId
parameters.description: An Ensembl gene ID. For example ENSG00000136999

parameters.name: proteinId
parameters.description: An Ensembl protein ID. For example ENSP00000439985

parameters.name: hugoSymbol
parameters.description: A Hugo Symbol For example ARF5

post.summary: Retrieves Ensembl Transcripts by Ensembl transcript IDs, hugo Symbols, protein IDs, or gene IDs

parameters.name: ensemblFilter
parameters.description:
List of Ensembl transcript IDs. For example ["ENST00000361390", "ENST00000361453", "ENST00000361624"]
OR
List of Hugo Symbols. For example ["TP53", "PIK3CA", "BRCA1"]
OR
List of Ensembl protein IDs. For example ["ENSP00000439985", "ENSP00000478460", "ENSP00000346196"]
OR
List of Ensembl gene IDs. For example ["ENSG00000136999", "ENSG00000272398", "ENSG00000198695"]

get.summary: Retrieves the transcript by an Ensembl transcript ID

parameters.name: transcriptId
parameters.description: An Ensembl transcript ID. For example ENST00000361390

get.summary: Perform lookups of Ensembl identifiers and retrieve their external references in other databases

parameters.name: accession
parameters.description: Ensembl gene accession. For example ENSG00000169083

post.summary: Retrieves PDB header info by a PDB id

parameters.name: pdbIds
parameters.description: List of pdb ids, for example ["1a37","1a4o"]

get.summary: Retrieves PDB header info by a PDB id

parameters.name: pdbId
parameters.description: PDB id, for example 1a37

post.summary: Retrieves PFAM domains by PFAM domain accession IDs

parameters.name: pfamAccessions
parameters.description: List of PFAM domain accession IDs. For example ["PF02827","PF00093","PF15276"]

get.summary: Retrieves a PFAM domain by a PFAM domain ID

parameters.name: pfamAccession
parameters.description: A PFAM domain accession ID. For example PF02827

geneIds.description: List of Ensembl gene IDs. For example ["ENSG00000136999", "ENSG00000272398", "ENSG00000198695"]

hugoSymbols.description: List of Hugo Symbols. For example ["TP53", "PIK3CA", "BRCA1"]

proteinIds.description: List of Ensembl protein IDs. For example ["ENSP00000439985", "ENSP00000478460", "ENSP00000346196"]

transcriptIds.description: List of Ensembl transcript IDs. For example ["ENST00000361390", "ENST00000361453", "ENST00000361624"]

strand.description: Strand exon is on, -1 for - and 1 for +

cosmicCount.description: Number of mutations in COSMIC for this protein

msaGaps.description: Portion of gaps in variant position in multiple sequence alignment

msaHeight.description: Number of diverse sequences in multiple sequence alignment (identical or highly similar sequences filtered out)

refseqPosition.description: Variant position in Refseq protein, can be different from the one in Uniprot

refseqResidue.description: Reference residue in Refseq protein, can be different from the one in Uniprot

snpCount.description: Number of SNPs in dbSNP for this protein

uniprotPosition.description: Variant position in Uniprot protein, can be different from the one in Refseq

uniprotResidue.description: Reference residue in Uniprot protein, can be different from the one in Refseq

strand.description: Strand UTR is on, -1 for - and 1 for +

transcriptConsequenceSummary.description: Most impactful transcript consequence of canonical transcript or if non-existent any transcript

transcriptConsequences.description: (Deprecated) Transcript consequence summaries (list of one when using annotation/, multiple when using annotation/summary/
